channel.title: femme fatales bonus
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "femme fatales bonus"

item.title: Re: femme fatales bonus
item.content:encoded: Ohh like that. Then i misunderstood. i thought it was 10-9 stamina = stamina each mission.

item.title: Re: femme fatales bonus
item.content:encoded:
To take a mission you need 10 stamina. +10 if you finish the mission with The Rack in your team.
Having Pinky lv.2 in your team gives 1 stamina back.
Female Fatales bonus gives 9 stamina back.
So the total is exactly 10 + 10 - 1 - 9 = 10
Therefore the total stamina used up to finish a mission with 'Female Fatales' is only 10 stamina
So there is no loss or gain while using this team (regarding stamina)

item.title: Re: femme fatales bonus
item.content:encoded: Yes, one of the bonuses is +9 Stamina, but this, combined with Pinky 2's +1 Stamina, only serves to counter The Rack's effect of -10 Stamina per mission.

item.title: femme fatales bonus
item.content:encoded:
http://bvs.wikidot.com/team:femme-fatales-bonus

One of the team bonuses are +9 stamina? anyone can confirm this? If this is true then you can keep on taking missions for like forever.
